- Location: Ceiling, bathroom area (vent above vanity area visible in photo).
- Component: Rectangular ceiling exhaust vent with metal louvers; drywall ceiling.
- Condition: Light staining/ discoloration around vent opening; patching visible around frame.
- Surface: Painted drywall; no visible peeling or mold growth.
- Recommendation: Verify exhaust fan operation and duct to exterior; assess moisture source and reseal/ repaint area if needed.
